wiki.content:
The B-Side of the single is a slightly differed version of Midnight Marauders track "The Chase, Pt. 2", which notably features the first known verse by future Tribe collaborator Consequence.
 
 "Award Tour" remains Tribe's highest charting single to date, experiencing large success in America and overseas.
 
 The song featured in the PlayStation game Thrasher: Skate and Destroy.
 
 Kanye West includes a tribute to "Award Tour" on his song The Glory on his album Graduation. The song also appears in the MLB 08: The Show soundtrack.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: The B-Side of the single is a slightly differed version of Midnight Marauders track "The Chase, Pt. 2", which notably features the first known verse by future Tribe collaborator Consequence.  "Award Tour" remains Tribe's highest charting single to date, experiencing large success in America and overseas.  The song featured in the PlayStation game Thrasher: Skate and Destroy.  Kanye West includes a tribute to "Award Tour" on his song The Glory on his album Graduation. The song also appears in the MLB 08: The Show soundtrack.

track.name: Award Tour
comments: Q-Tip says this track was inspired by Jade's Don't Walk Away. You can hear the influence most in the bass line IMO.
LOL @ bitching about no Mos Def during Award Tour. Go steal some taste.
8 songs and no mos def. why did I choose a mos def station. get on the ball ya'll. I am mos definite and I think soooo.
I know you're happy that this song came on. Enjoy it.
I was like "oh hell yeah" when this came on
do dat do dat do do dat dat dat
love this vibe <3 , classic NY shit
